generate_anki_card¶

Implements AnkiObject.

Relies heavily on genanki.

Its purpose is to handle everything Anki-related:

  • construct card template from html-, css-, and js-files

  • generating and adding cards

  • saving apgk-file

class generate_anki_card.AnkiObject[source]¶

Class containing all necessary objects from the genanki-module to handle everything Anki-related.

model¶

genanki.model

deck¶

genanki.deck

package¶

genanki.package

fields¶

List of field-names on anki-card.

add_card(self, media_files=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Add card constructed from **kwargs to deck and media_files to package.media_files.

Parameters

  • media_files (List[str]) – Media files used on card. (Default value = None)

  • **kwargs – In the form: field_name="content".

write_apkg(self, out_path)[source]¶

Writes current package as apkg-file to out_path

Parameters

out_path – Path wherer .apkg-file is saved.

class generate_anki_card.HtmlLoader[source]¶

Loads and processes html.

path[source]¶

Path to load html-file from.

replace_includes_with_content(self)[source]¶

Inserts content of js-source-files at appropriate places and returns body.

  • Removes src attributes from <script>-tags and inserts the content of the files.

  • <script>-tags with “defer”-attribute are moved to the bottom of the body.

  • <script>-tags in the header are moved to the top of the body.

Returns

Body of processed html-file.

Return type

str

set_of_fields(self)[source]¶

Get names of fields (as recognized by Anki) in the content of the html-file.

Returns

Field names.

Return type

Set[str]

string[source]¶

Content of the file at path.

generate_anki_card.model_from_html(name, template_names, model_id, css_path)[source]¶

Construct Model from html- and css-files.

Parameters

  • name – Model name.

  • template_names – List of html-paths.

  • model_id – Unique id-string for the model.

  • css_path – Path of css-file.

Returns

constructed genanki.model
